brightness_threshold.title: Brightness threshold
brightness_threshold.description: Brightness threshold; should be greater than noise level and less than contrast of edges to be preserved

spatial_size.title: Spatial size
spatial_size.description: Spatial size (sigma, i.e., half-width) of smoothing, in mm

dimensionality.title: Dimensionality
dimensionality.description: Dimensionality (2 or 3), for within-plane (2) or fully 3D (3) smoothing

use_median_filter.title: Use median filter
use_median_filter.description: Use median filter for cases where single-point noise is detected (0 or 1)

n_usans.title: Number of USANs
n_usans.description: Determine if the smoothing area is found from secondary images (0, 1 or 2)

brightness_threshold1.title: Brightness threshold 1
brightness_threshold1.description: Brightness threshold for first USAN image

brightness_threshold2.title: Brightness threshold 2
brightness_threshold2.description: Brightness threshold for second USAN image
